column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of RuAl6 were synthesized via an arc-melting
#Text=were put together on a water-cooled copper hearth with a Zr button
#Text=The sample was turned and remelted several
#Text=The sample was then wrapped in thin tantalum foil, put in an
#Text=evacuated quartz tube, and annealed at T = 620 °C (∼40 °C below
#Text=the melting point of Al and Al-rich eutectic13) for 14 days.
#Text=annealing, the ampoule was quenched in water at room temperature.
